alert.note: Alert for Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai West; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala (Hawaii) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Surf Advisory issued November 20 at 4:15PM HST until November 21 at 6:00AM HST by NWS Honolulu
info.description: ...HIGH SURF WARNING FOR NORTH AND WEST FACING SHORES OF NIIHAU AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU AND MOLOKAI... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY FOR WEST FACING SHORES OF KAUAI OAHU MOLOKAI AND FOR NORTH FACING SHORES OF MAUI... .A large north-northwest (340 degrees) swell will bring dangerously high surf to exposed north facing shores, and high surf to west facing shores. The swell will gradually diminish and turn more northerly on Tuesday. ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM HST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Large breaking waves of 18 to 22 feet across north facing shores of Maui and Molokai, and 10 to 15 feet across west facing shores of Niihau, Kauai, Oahu, Molokai. * WHERE...Kauai Southwest, Waianae Coast, Maui Windward West, Molokai West, Maui Central Valley North and Windward Haleakala. * WHEN...Until 6 AM HST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Moderate. Strong breaking waves and strong currents will make swimming dangerous.
info.instruction: Head all advice from ocean safety officials. When in doubt, don`t go out.

area.areaDesc: Kauai Southwest; Maui Central Valley North; Maui Windward West; Molokai West; Waianae Coast; Windward Haleakala
